SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
CachePort
Optional port for plugging in a caching layer.
CosineSimilarityStrategy
Computes similarity using the Cosine Similarity formula.
InMemorySimilarityStore
Thread-safe, in-memory implementation of SimilarityStore.
Interaction
Represents a single user–item interaction with a numeric score.
InteractionLoader
Port for loading user–item interactions in batches.
InteractionMatrix
Builds the item–user interaction matrix from raw Interaction data.
NoOpCachePort
No-operation implementation of CachePort.
RecommendationConfig
Immutable configuration object for the RecommendationEngine.
RecommendationConfig.Builder
 
RecommendationEngine
Main entry point of the ItemCF library.
RecommendationResult
A recommended item along with its aggregated relevance score.
SimilarityCalculator
Computes pairwise item-similarity scores from an InteractionMatrix.
SimilarityResult
Holds the computed similarity score between two items.
SimilarityStore
Port for persisting and retrieving pre-computed item-similarity scores.
SimilarityStrategy
Strategy interface for computing the similarity score between two items.
